name: AAITI - Auto AI Trading Interface
description: Production-Ready AI Trading Platform with Enterprise Architecture and Comprehensive Documentation
features: Docker-first installation and deployment
Advanced performance optimizations and tuning
Multi-stage Docker builds with security hardening
Docker Compose profiles for flexible deployments
Nginx reverse proxy with SSL/TLS support
Prometheus and Grafana monitoring integration
Redis caching support for enhanced performance
Comprehensive performance configuration system
Container health monitoring and auto-recovery
Non-root container security with minimal attack surface
Makefile automation for simplified operations
Interactive Docker-only installation script
Complete ML algorithms with SVM and LSTM support
Advanced ML performance metrics with precision, recall, and F1-score
Time series forecasting with ARIMA, SARIMA, SARIMAX, and Prophet models
Comprehensive documentation structure with 15+ detailed guides
Lightweight README with organized documentation links
Complete API reference with 400+ documented endpoints
User guide with step-by-step tutorials and screenshots
Troubleshooting guide with solutions for common issues
